name: Aztec Challenge Basic
overview: A remake of the original Aztec Challenge action game that was released in 1983, in this more BASIC version you still run towards the ziggurat while avoiding the spears thrown at you from the warriors forming the gauntlet that leads to the structure. Pull back on the stick to duck, push forward to jump the low spears. If you make it to the structure you must climb dangerous stairs and cross the deadly bridge.
